dt: {bc}to breathe during sleep with a rough hoarse noise due to vibration of the soft palate

et: Middle English {it}snoren, fnoren{/it}; akin to Old English {it}fnora{/it} sneezing, {it}fnǣran{/it} to breathe heavily
shortdef: to breathe during sleep with a rough hoarse noise due to vibration of the soft palate
to spend (time) in snoring or sleeping
